unnormalised: **Home Loan Bonanza: Diwali Dhamaka for Homebuyers!**
normalised: **Home Loan Bonanza: Diwali Dhamaka for Homebuyers!**

unnormalised: Thinking of finally buying that dream flat in Bandra, Mumbai? Diwali might just be your lucky break! Several banks, including HDFC and ICICI, are rolling out attractive home loan schemes with interest rates starting as low as 8.5% p.a.
normalised: Thinking of finally buying that dream flat in Bandra, Mumbai? Diwali might just be your lucky break! Several banks, including H D F C and I C I C I, are rolling out attractive home loan schemes with interest rates starting as low as eight point five percent per annum.

unnormalised: State Bank of India (SBI) is even waiving processing fees – cha-ching! Experts say now's a good time to jump in, especially with property prices stabilizing in many areas.
normalised: State Bank of India (S B I) is even waiving processing fees – cha-ching! Experts say now's a good time to jump in, especially with property prices stabilizing in many areas.

unnormalised: But hold your horses! Don't just grab the first offer you see. Shop around, compare EMIs, and read the fine print like your auntie reads your marriage biodata! Remember that low initial rate might balloon later on.
normalised: But hold your horses! Don't just grab the first offer you see. Shop around, compare E M I s, and read the fine print like your auntie reads your marriage biodata! Remember that low initial rate might balloon later on.

unnormalised: And while you're dreaming of your new home, picture yourself enjoying a plate of delicious biryani in your new balcony during the festive season. Now *that's* a Diwali to remember! Check out offers near you on magicbricks.com or housing.com for properties upto 10 km from major cities. Many projects even offer discounts upto Rs. 2 Lakhs!
normalised: And while you're dreaming of your new home, picture yourself enjoying a plate of delicious biryani in your new balcony during the festive season. Now *that's* a Diwali to remember! Check out offers near you on magicbricks dot com or housing dot com for properties up to ten kilometer from major cities. Many projects even offer discounts up to rupee two lakhs!
